document.bingtitle: Yahoo! Canada Answers - Does the restaurant chick-fil-a deliver?
document.webtitle: Yahoo! Canada Answers - Does the restaurant chick-fil-a deliver?
document.description: They only deliver catered orders. No fast food restaurant ... they delivered. Though it was a very large order. ... by bill Member since: July 03, 2009 Total points: ...

What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question Lois Griffin Member since: May 28, 2011 Total points: 2,163 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Does the restaurant chick-fil-a deliver? I called a chick-fil-a restaurant and asked them if they deliver....and they said"yes".......
being a former chick-fil-a employee........this is news to me! lol. I mean, I knew they sell things in"catering trays"but I didn't know they actually drive out and deliver them.
Do they use their own car? Are these minimum wage employees making the deliveries or does the boss do them? How come I never knew this? 9 months ago Report Abuse by cuidich'n righ Member since: October 07, 2011 Total points: 1,813 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker sometimes, the big ones have cars moded to look like cows 9 months ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: . Action Bar: 1 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
This question about" Does the restaurant … "was originally asked in Yahoo! Answers United States
Other Answers (4) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by anu0202 Member since: October 21, 2007 Total points: 500 (Level 2) Add Contact Block No - Chick-fil-a do not deliver. They only deliver catered orders. 9 months ago Report Abuse by mccoyblu... Member since: June 01, 2007 Total points: 133,364 (Level 7) Badge Image: Add Contact Block They only deliver catered orders. No fast food restaurant delivers individual orders. 9 months ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by natalie Member since: July 26, 2011 Total points: 816 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Maybe when you worked they didnt have it or no one else knew in that area so no one asked. When I was in Denver they delivered. Though it was a very large order. 9 months ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by bill Member since: July 03, 2009 Total points: 2,471 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Yes, but only to the tables in their restaurant. 9 months ago Report Abuse
